headline: How the Recent 17% Drop Impacts Keurig Dr Pepper’s True 2025 Value
summary: If you are looking at Keurig Dr Pepper’s stock and wondering whether now is finally the time to buy, you are not alone. After years of outpacing the S&P 500, the company’s shares have lagged behind lately, with the price down nearly 18.4% over the past year and a sharp 17.2% slide in just the last week. That’s a pretty notable move, especially considering the stock is now down 8.4% year-to-date. Still, if you zoom out a bit, the five-year return remains positive at 10.8%. These pronounced...
